    • Uses of TestResource in nz.ac.auckland.morc.resource

      Classes in nz.ac.auckland.morc.resource that implement TestResource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GroovyTemplateTestResource
      A test resource that has delayed evaluation of a groovy script with appropriate variables
      class  HeadersTestResource
      Provides a mechanism for setting key/value pairs for message headers either as a mock response, or setting an expectation for the contents of a header.
      class  JsonTestResource
      Provides a mechanism for retrieving JSON values from a file/URL/String and also validating the response from a target service.
      class  PlainTextTestResource
      A simple mechanism for sending and comparing plain text values using the Java equals mechanism
      class  SoapFaultTestResource
      A way to specify a SOAP Fault to return back to the application under testing, or validate a response SoapFault
      class  StaticTestResource<T>
      Used for retrieving static resources necessary for either sending values to an artifact under testing, or validating an expectation
      class  XmlTestResource
      Provides a mechanism for retrieving XML values from a file/URL/String and also validating a response from a target service.
